titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Bow-Church, April the Xvith. 1690 before the Lord Maior, and Court of Aldermen, and citizens of London, being the fast-day by Edward Fowler.
titleStmt.author: Fowler, Edward, 1632-1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.M. for Brabazon Alymer [sic] ... and Awnsham Churchil ...,

notesStmt.note: Half-title: Dr. Fowlers sermon preached at Bow Church, on the fast day, April the 16th, 1690.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
